comments: Nice review of probabilities. I am interested in Operations Research, so I liked the topics covered in this class (dynamic programming and queuing systems) and I think they will be useful if I decide to continue in this area of study.

For engineers (at least in my area) I don't think the class was very useful. While interesting and a good class if you are running simulations (Monte Carlo for example), it did not apply to me as much as I thought it would.
